SEARCH
Module com.therealworld.fitschedule
Package com.therealworld.fitschedule.controllers

Class RegisterController

java.lang.Object
com.therealworld.fitschedule.controllers.RegisterController
public class RegisterController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling user registration in the FitSchedule application. Provides functionality to validate user inputs, register new users, and navigate between views.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegisterController

      public RegisterController()
      Default constructor. Initializes the `SqliteDAO` instance for interacting with the user database.

  • Method Details

    • setUserDAO

      public void setUserDAO(SqliteDAO userDAO)
      Setter method for injecting a mock DAO for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      userDAO - the `SqliteDAO` instance to set.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the registration view components after the FXML elements are loaded. Sets the default focus on the root element of the scene.

    • onRegisterButtonClick

      protected void onRegisterButtonClick()
      Handles the registration button click event. Validates user inputs and attempts to register a new user. If registration is successful, displays a success message; otherwise, shows an error message.

    • onShowUsersButtonClick

      protected void onShowUsersButtonClick()
      Handles the show users button click event. Retrieves and displays all users in the console.

    • onBackToLoginClick

      protected void onBackToLoginClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the back to login button click event. Navigates the user back to the login view.
      Parameters:
      event - the event triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the login view FXML file.

    • clearFocus

      protected void clearFocus()
      Clears the focus from all text fields and buttons in the registration form.
